verses.verse: שִׁלְחוּ־ <S%H7971><s%> Send כַ֥ר <S%H3733><s%> ye the lamb מֹשֵֽׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> to the ruler אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִסֶּ֣לַע <S%H5554><s%> from Sela מִדְבָּ֑רָה <S%H4057><s%> to the wilderness אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> unto the mount בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְעוֹף־ <S%H5775><s%> bird נוֹדֵ֖ד <S%H5074><s%> For it shall be [that] as a wandering קֵ֣ן <S%H7064><s%> of the nest מְשֻׁלָּ֑ח <S%H7971><s%> cast out תִּֽהְיֶ֙ינָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> [so] the daughters מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מַעְבָּרֹ֖ת <S%H4569><s%> shall be at the fords לְאַרְנֽוֹן׃ <S%H769><s%> of Arnon

[הָבִיאוּ כ] (הָבִ֤יאִי <S%H935><s%> abide ק) עֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> counsel עֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> execute פְלִילָ֔ה <S%H6415><s%> judgment שִׁ֧יתִי <S%H7896><s%> make כַלַּ֛יִל <S%H3915><s%> as the night צִלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H6738><s%> thy shadow בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst צָהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> of the noonday סַתְּרִי֙ <S%H5641><s%> hide נִדָּחִ֔ים <S%H5080><s%> the outcasts נֹדֵ֖ד <S%H5074><s%> not him that wandereth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּגַלִּֽי׃ <S%H1540><s%> bewray

יָג֤וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> dwell בָךְ֙ נִדָּחַ֔י <S%H5080><s%> Let mine outcasts מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H4124><s%> with thee Moab הֱוִי־ <S%H1933><s%> be סֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> thou a covert לָ֖מוֹ מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> to them from the face שׁוֹדֵ֑ד <S%H7703><s%> of the spoiler כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָפֵ֤ס <S%H656><s%> is at an end הַמֵּץ֙ <S%H4160><s%> for the extortioner כָּ֣לָה <S%H3615><s%> ceaseth שֹׁ֔ד <S%H7701><s%> the spoiler תַּ֥מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> are consumed רֹמֵ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> the oppressors מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the land

וְהוּכַ֤ן <S%H3559><s%> be established בַּחֶ֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> And in mercy כִּסֵּ֔א <S%H3678><s%> shall the throne וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> and he shall sit עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> on בֶּאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> upon it in truth בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שֹׁפֵ֛ט <S%H8199><s%> judging וְדֹרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> and seeking מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּמְהִ֥ר <S%H4106><s%> and hasting צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H6664><s%> righteousness

שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> We have heard גְאוֹן־ <S%H1347><s%> of the pride מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab גֵּ֣א <S%H1341><s%> proud מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [he is] very גַּאֲוָת֧וֹ <S%H1346><s%> [even] of his haughtiness וּגְאוֹנ֛וֹ <S%H1347><s%> and his pride וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <S%H5678><s%> and his wrath לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H907><s%> [but] his lies ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יְיֵלִ֥יל <S%H3213><s%> howl מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H4124><s%> Therefore shall Moab לְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> for Moab כֻּלֹּ֣ה <S%H3605><s%> everyone יְיֵלִ֑יל <S%H3213><s%> every one shall howl לַאֲשִׁישֵׁ֧י <S%H808><s%> for the foundations קִיר־ חֲרֶ֛שֶׂת <S%H7025><s%> of Kirhareseth תֶּהְגּ֖וּ <S%H1897><s%> shall ye mourn אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> are utterly נְכָאִֽים׃ <S%H5218><s%> surely [they are] stricken

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For שַׁדְמוֹת֩ <S%H7709><s%> For the fields חֶשְׁבּ֨וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon אֻמְלָ֜ל <S%H535><s%> languish גֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> [and] the vine שִׂבְמָ֗ה <S%H7643><s%> of Sibmah בַּעֲלֵ֤י <S%H1167><s%> the lords גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen הָלְמ֣וּ <S%H1986><s%> have broken down שְׂרוּקֶּ֔יהָ <S%H8291><s%> the principal plants עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far יַעְזֵ֥ר <S%H3270><s%> [even] unto Jazer נָגָ֖עוּ <S%H5060><s%> thereof they are come תָּ֣עוּ <S%H8582><s%> they wandered מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> [through] the wilderness שְׁלֻ֣חוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H7976><s%> her branches נִטְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H5203><s%> are stretched out עָ֥בְרוּ <S%H5674><s%> they are gone over יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> the sea

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶבְכֶּ֞ה <S%H1058><s%> Therefore I will bewail בִּבְכִ֤י <S%H1065><s%> with the weeping יַעְזֵר֙ <S%H3270><s%> of Jazer גֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> the vine שִׂבְמָ֔ה <S%H7643><s%> of Sibmah אֲרַיָּ֙וֶךְ֙ <S%H7301><s%> I will water דִּמְעָתִ֔י <S%H1832><s%> thee with my tears חֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <S%H2809><s%> O Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֑ה <S%H500><s%> and Elealeh כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over קֵיצֵ֛ךְ <S%H7019><s%> for thy summer fruits וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over קְצִירֵ֖ךְ <S%H7105><s%> and for thy harvest הֵידָ֥ד <S%H1959><s%> for the shouting נָפָֽל׃ <S%H5307><s%> is fallen

וְנֶאֱסַ֨ף <S%H622><s%> is taken away שִׂמְחָ֤ה <S%H8057><s%> And gladness וָגִיל֙ <S%H1524><s%> and joy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3759><s%> out of the plentiful field וּבַכְּרָמִ֥ים <S%H3754><s%> and in the vineyards לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יְרֻנָּ֖ן <S%H7442><s%> there shall be no singing לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No יְרֹעָ֑ע <S%H7321><s%> neither shall there be shouting יַ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> no wine בַּיְקָבִ֛ים <S%H3342><s%> in [their] presses לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <S%H1869><s%> the treaders הַדֹּרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1869><s%> shall tread out הֵידָ֥ד <S%H1959><s%> I have made [their vintage] shouting הִשְׁבַּֽתִּי׃ <S%H7673><s%> to cease

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that מֵעַ֣י <S%H4578><s%> Wherefore my bowels לְמוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> for Moab כַּכִּנּ֖וֹר <S%H3658><s%> like an harp יֶֽהֱמ֑וּ <S%H1993><s%> shall sound וְקִרְבִּ֖י <S%H7130><s%> and mine inward parts לְקִ֥יר חָֽרֶשׂ׃ <S%H7025><s%> for Kirharesh

וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when נִרְאָ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> And it shall come to pass when it is seen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When נִלְאָ֥ה <S%H3811><s%> is weary מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> that Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַבָּמָ֑ה <S%H1116><s%> on the high place וּבָ֧א <S%H935><s%> that he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his מִקְדָּשׁ֛וֹ <S%H4720><s%> to his sanctuary לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> to pray וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> but he shall not prevail

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> concerning Moab מֵאָֽז׃ <S%H227><s%> since that time

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> But now the LORD לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying בְּשָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> Within three שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years כִּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> as the years שָׂכִ֔יר <S%H7916><s%> of an hireling וְנִקְלָה֙ <S%H7034><s%> shall be contemned כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all הֶהָמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> multitude הָרָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> with all that great וּשְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> and the remnant מְעַ֛ט <S%H4592><s%> [shall be] very מִזְעָ֖ר <S%H4213><s%> small ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not כַבִּֽיר׃ <S%H3524><s%> feeble ס
